title: New: Celeste – What's Your Poison
body:
**Celeste’s** debut track, [Born Again](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/29237-new-celeste-born), showcased one of the most exciting young talents around at the moment, and her second offering, _What’s Your Poison_, ups the game in style. More punchy and bolder, it’s twists and turns bear resemblance to moments on the debut LP from FKA Twigs, or even the few highlights of BANKS’s Goddess. Check it out below.
